wikitext.*:
'''''Narsilion''''' is a [[Spain|Spanish]] folk/darkwave/ethereal music group. Their music contains references to the [[legendarium]] of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. The name refers to ''[[Narsilion]]'', the lay whose title is mentioned fleetingly in ''[[The Silmarillion]]''. 

==Discography==
*''Nerbeleth'' (2004)
*''Return to the Silver Forest'' (2004)
*''Arcadia'' (2006)
*''Namárië'' (2008) (Contains the track ''El Llanto de [[Galadriel]]'')
*''Elenna Nórë'' (2011)
